SEARCH
Package mainPackage

Class DoublyLinkedList

java.lang.Object
mainPackage.DoublyLinkedList
public class DoublyLinkedList extends Object
The DoublyLinkedList class contains the doubly linked list of topics Contains DNode class for the nodes in the linked list Contains methods to add and remove nodes from beggining, end, and at a certain index Methods that returns length of the linked list Methods useful for browsing, inserting, removing, and modifying topics mainly used in the driver class
